title: GPP#10 - Ghost Partnership Proposal
body:
Proposal Summary 

The proposal is for a partnership with m.encore to make an English review in our Litepaper. 
M.encore is a Ghost Maker and has been living in London for over 5 years. Her English skills are pretty good, and since our Litepaper wasn’t written by everyday English-speaking people, it is important to have her expert review.

Motivation 

To ensure Litepaper is in proper English.

Details of the deal: 

- Timeframe: 1 week to complete 
- Work hours: Not measured in hours
- Price: 0.024 DAI/word - The Litepaper has 8127 words = 195,05 DAI
- Delivery: A google doc w/ comments on English language corrections
- Bonus: None
- Vesting: No 
- Requirement: Need voting (DAI payment)
- Budget Origin: Marketing > GFDao Launch

Relevant Information 

GFDao Litepaper - Ghost Partner Requirements: https://docs.ghost.finance/#499eb724e5654273a4550a3bb3b294ca
choices: No, I do NOT APPROVE GPP#10
author: 0x56d78862dcC0bf47C87bdE39BAD9a5A4e9085D00
